item.title: New Summer v3.9 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 6, 2025

New Summer v3.9 ATS

This mod makes improvements to the default summer weather and environment for American Truck Simulator.

Key Features
Improved grass and trees
Increased grass density
More flowery vegetation
Realistic terrain colouring
Improved rain
Weather improvements

Compatible with all map DLC’s

Compatibility latest version: ATS 1.55

Changes in v3.9
Updated for 1.55

Recommended settings
Vegetation Detail: High
Grass Density: High

Important!
Please disable other weather and graphics mods or you may experience issues, conflicts and crashes.
New Summer should be given a high priority in Mod Manager.

Credits: Grimes

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Italy Map Project v14 for 1.55 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 6, 2025

Italy Map Project v14 for 1.55 ETS2

Changes v14
V14 adapted for 1.55

The changes that have been made to the base map are of two categories: the restylings and everything that was built from scratch.

As restyling there are:
– Genoa (also includes parts made from scratch)
– Verona (also includes parts made from scratch)
– Livorno (also includes parts made from scratch)
– Venice
– Cuneo
– Milan
– A22 motorway (also includes parts made from scratch)
– A4 motorway
– A21 motorway
– A55 motorway
– A12 motorway
– A1 motorway (also includes parts made from scratch)
– A14 motorway (also includes parts made from scratch)
– A6 motorway
– A7 motorway
– A2 motorway
– A10 motorway
– A20 motorway
– A18 motorway
– Many state roads… (also includes parts made from scratch)
– Many service areas…

As constructions from scratch, there are:
– Giglio Island
– Porto S. Stefano
– Variante di Valico (A1)
– Foggia
– Vicenza
– Siena
– A15 motorway
– Reggio Calabria
– Elba island
– Portoferraio
– Port of Obia
– Lake Garda
– Chioggia
– Pesaro
– Brenner
– Bardonecchia
– Fossano
– Affi
– Frosinone
– Agrigento
– Mestre and Marghera

The map only requires the Italy and France DLCs.
Compatible with SCS Base Map
Game version: 1.55

Credits: Matt17

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: SCS Extracted 2 1.55 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 6, 2025

SCS Extracted 2 1.55 ETS2

SCS Extracted unpacks SCS files in ATS and ETS2 ver 1.55.xx

ATTENTION! I made SCS_Extracted_2_ for myself, and maybe you don’t need it.
RAR archive SCS_Extracted_2_.rar ~1.2 MB contains files:
– #_SCS_Extracted_2_.exe,
– ReadMe_.txt and image.jpg,
– image___.jpg,
– Manual__Read_Me_.txt,
– sshot-220.jpg,
– sshot-221.jpg,
– sshot-222.jpg

Attention! There are no viruses in SCS_Extracted.
But some inexperienced (underdeveloped) antivirus programs may warn about the threat that SCS_Extracted supposedly poses.
There are no viruses in SCS_Extracted! THERE IS NO threat!

– SCS_Extracted is a way to unpack scs files in games: ATS and ETS2 for their modification and modding.
– SCS_Extracted is based on the [ scs_packer.exe ]
– This version of SCS_Extracted is improved. More convenient to use and does not depend on the number of scs files in the games ATS and ETS2

Start of installation:
– Run the SCS_Extracted_2_.exe file and specify any convenient location on any disk and the #_SCS_Extracted_2_ folder will be created there and a link this folder will be created on the desktop.
– Free space for unpacking ALL! scs files is needed approximately: 69 GB in ATS + 136 GB in ETS2
– After that, in the created #_SCS_Extracted_2_ folder, read Manual__Read_Me_.txt to continue.

IT IS PERMITTED TO DISTRIBUTE THIS ARCHIVE WITHOUT USING THE ORIGINAL LINK.

Credits: bobo58

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Pizz 389 Peterbilt Megapack v4.3.1 1.55 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | July 6, 2025

Pizz 389 Peterbilt Megapack v4.3.1 1.55 ATS

There are plenty of options to keep you occupied and much more to come. Some of the features are:
– Daycab, 36/48/63″ flattop sleepers, 48/63″ standup sleepers, a custom chopped 72″ sleeper. Some of the sleepers have diamond windows in the rear.
– For chassis right now there is 220, 250, 305″ and a 305″ with pusher axle.
– Plenty of front/rear bumpers, headlights, mirrors, exhaust, airlines for you to explore.
– Intensive customisation options for accessories and parts
– Templates

Compatibility: 1.55

Credits: Damo,Eric Pizzolo, D3D

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

police cars for 11 countries

All standalone, works on any maps.
Included real 3D logos for default cars and over 600 skins for different vans.
Models of other authors: Dacia Logan (Srele), MB Vito, W210, VW Passat B5, Renault Kangoo (Alexx_Os), some skins by IJ’s Mods.
Compatible with all my packs.
For version 1.55.x

Version 21.8.7 – compatibility update for patch 1.55.x, repacked with new 1.55 SCS Game Archive Packer version (for better performance in 1.55), fixed some wheel models

Credits: Jazzycat
